article.name: Integrate CnSight with Your KnowBe4 Console
article.title: Integrate CnSight with Your KnowBe4 Console
article.body:
In this article, you’ll learn how to integrate your CnSight platform with your KSAT console. This integration will allow you to send phishing data from your KSAT console to your CnSight platform to provide a broader view of your organization’s cybersecurity performance.

Note: Before you set up this integration, you'll need to copy the Reporting API Token from your KSAT Account Settings. For more information, see the API section of our KSAT Account Settings: Account Integrations article.

To learn how to integrate your KSAT console with your CnSight platform, follow the steps below:

  1. Log in to your CnSight account.
  2. Click Integration Center from the Organization drop-down menu.

  3. Scroll to the KnowBe4 card in the Security Training & Awareness section.

  4. Click the pencil icon.
  5. Paste your Reporting API token in the KnowBe4 API Token field.

  6. Click Submit.

You will see a green confirmation message notifying you of the successful connection.

To verify that the integration was successful, click the clock icon on the KnowBe4 card. A drop-down menu will appear with the status and timestamp of the most recent data sync.

Once the connection is established, click Phishing Incidents And Training from the Security Functions drop-down menu to get a detailed report of all Cybersecurity Performance Indicators (CPIs) and phishing results.
